StringTable.Label: READYBTN_TOOLTIP
StringTable.String: Set yourself to Ready, locking in your Team and Civilization choices.[BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]All players must be Ready to start.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: UNREADYBTN_TOOLTIP
StringTable.String: Set yourself to Un-Ready, allowing you to change Team and Civilization.[BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]All players must be Ready to start.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: KICKBTN_TOOLTIP
StringTable.String: Remove this player from the lobby.

StringTable.Label: ADDBTN_TOOLTIP
StringTable.String: Add an AI player to the game. You can set the AI Player's Team and Civilization.

StringTable.Label: REMOVEBTN_TOOLTIP
StringTable.String: Remove this AI player from the game.

StringTable.Label: CLAIMBTN_TOOLTIP
StringTable.String: Claim this AI controlled Civilization in a Restored multiplayer game.

StringTable.Label: CONVERTBTN_TOOLTIP
StringTable.String: Convert a human player into an AI player in a Restored multiplayer game. Players can retake control of the Civilization when they join the lobby.

StringTable.Label: TEAMSPINNER_TOOLTIP
StringTable.String: Set the Team for this player. A player with "-" for their Team is not on any team. Players on the same team share vision and cannot declare war on each other.

StringTable.Label: DIFFICULTYSPINNER_TOOLTIP
StringTable.String: Set the AI Difficulty for this AI player.
